## serialization package

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IAnnotation](./serialization.iannotation.md) | An annotation applied to the series. |
|  [IDataSeries](./serialization.idataseries.md) | A serialized data series. |
|  [IDataSeriesMap](./serialization.idataseriesmap.md) | A map of named data series. |
|  [ISerializedData](./serialization.iserializeddata.md) | The serialized form of a data. This is an ordinary JavaScript data structure that can be used to transfer a data across the wire and reinstantiate it on the otherside. |
